sourcesContent:
<template>
  <paginate
    :page-count=totalPages
    :page-range="3"
    :margin-pages="1"
    :click-handler="clickCallback"
    :prev-text="'Trước'"
    :next-text="'Sau'"
    :container-class="'pagination'"
    :page-class="'page-item'"
    :force-page="pageIndex"
  >
  </paginate>
</template>

<script>
  import Paginate from 'vuejs-paginate-next';
  export default {
    components: {
      paginate: Paginate,
    },
    props: ["totalPages"],
     methods: {
      clickCallback(value){
       this.$emit("pageNumber", value);
      }

    },
   data() {
     return {
       pageNumber: this.clickCallback()
     }
   },

  };
</script>

<style scoped>
  .pagination {
    display: flex;
      border-radius: 50%;
    border-style: solid;
    border-width: 1px;
    opacity: 1;
  }
  .page-item {
  }
</style>
